rules_text: [i]Augmented[/i] – When Dead End Adventurer enters the battlefield, if you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn, destroy target creature you don't control.
flavor_text: [i]“When my English teacher said ‘You're gonna go far kid', I doubt he pictured the insides of Mephisto's Gate.”[/i]
